channel.title: Hybrid Images on Toan Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Hybrid Images on Toan Nguyen

item.title: IllusionPIN: Shoulder-Surfing Resistant Authentication Using Hybrid Images
item.description: IllusionPIN is a new PIN-based authentication method that is resilient against shoulder-surfing and surveillance video threats. IllusionPIN deploys a hybrid-image keyboard that appears one way to the close-up user and differently to an observer at a distance of three feet or greater.
